魼魼魼

魼字的基本解释

魼
qū
比目鱼。

魼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qū］
［《廣韻》去魚切，平魚，溪。］
［《廣韻》吐盍切，入盍，透。］
亦作“鱋1”。
鱼名。即比目鱼。
[②]［xié］
［《集韻》迄業切，入業，曉。］
鱼胁，鱼的肋骨部位。

魼字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魼； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1467第08
【唐韻】去魚切【集韻】丘於切，?音墟。【說文】魚也。【類篇】一曰比目魚。【前漢·司馬相如傳】禺禺魼鰨。【註】魼，比目魚也。狀似牛脾，細鱗，紫色，兩相合乃得行。又【山海經】柢山有魚焉，其狀如牛，蛇尾，有翼有羽，在脅下，曰魼魚。【玉篇】亦作鰈。【類篇】或作鱋。又【廣韻】吐盍切【集韻】託盍切，?音榻。又【集韻】迄業切，音脅。義?同。

魼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
魼字的起名意思

暂无。

Ray
Basic explanation of words
Ray
qū
flounder.
Ray
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qū］
["Guangyun" cut fish, flat fish, stream. ]
["Guangyun" cuts into the spit, enters the spit, and penetrates. ]
Also known as "鱋1".
The name of the fish. Namely flounder.
[②]［xié］
["Ji Yun" has so far cut into the industry, enters the industry, dawn. ]
Fish flanks, the ribs of fish.
Ray
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　魼; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1467-08
【Tang Yun】Go Yuqie 【Jiyun】Qiu Yuqie, sound market. [Said Wen] Yu Ye. 【Classes】One is flounder. 【Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography】Yu Yu Yi Li. 【Note】Snakes and flounders are also. It looks like a cow's spleen, with fine scales and purple. Also [Shan Hai Jing] There are fish in Zhenshan, which looks like an ox, a snake tail, with wings and feathers. Under the flanks, they are called rays. [Jade articles] Also used as plaice. 【Classes】Or as a poem. Also [Guangyun] To spit and cut [Jiyun] To support the scorpion and cut, sound couch. Also 【Jiyun】has been cut so far, sound threatened. Righteous? Same.
Ray
